title: What Has Happened To The Church? (Video) | U. S. Politics | Before It's News
text: What Has Happened To The Church? (Video) In this episode, we’ll take a look at where a particular modern mega church has gone by way of apostatizing from the truth. We’ll also see what God has to say about it and we do warn about the end result of these false teachers and prophets if people continue to follow them.
